title: 2025 Sea Otter Classic Radar Roundup: New Drops from Tailfin, Stinner, DT Swiss, Salsa, RockShox, Moots, and More!
content:
With so many products being announced at the beginning of Sea Otter Classic this year, we decided to roll as many of them as possible into one Radar Roundup post for you. Enjoy the deluge of new releases!

Tailfin AeroPack Cargo/AP18 Cargo

In 2018 Tailfin released the AeroPack (the brand’s integrated rack and top bag) and the AP18 (the detachable version of this rack top bag for use with the brand’s stand-alone racks). Since then, Tailfin has made minor improvements such as increasing the size of the zips and strengthening the internal frame. In 2025 the lineage continues with the launch of the all new AeroPack Cargo/AP18 Cargo.

Designed to be compatible with existing systems, the AeroPack Cargo/AP18 Cargo will sit in the range alongside the existing AeroPack and AP18 Top Bag, using Tailfin’s modular system to allow any of our current customers to easily upgrade. New customers can specify the AeroPack Cargo or AP18 Cargo from the outset, with the ability to switch to the non-Cargo versions later down the line if they wish.

Specs:

  • 18 litres in the main body +3 litres of easy-access storage.
  • Fully compatible with existing systems.
  • Based on the current AeroPack/AP18 footprint. Can be set up as an AeroPack or Rack Top Bag.
  • Expandable cargo pockets. Perfect for stowing regularly needed kit.
  • Single-buckle access to the main body of the bag.
  • Adjustable compression strap adds even more storage options.
  • Light coloured internal base for visibility.
  • Signature Tailfin Hypalon, Diamond Ripstop & Stretch Nylon fabrics chosen for durability and flexibility. 6061-T6 internal
  • aluminium frame.
  • Welded construction = 100% waterproof.
  • Additional mounting points for water bottle/cargo cage.
  • AP18 Cargo £190 / $260 / €240
  • AeroPack Carbon Cargo with pannier mounts £430 / $590 / €540 (upgrade from regular AeroPack £30 / $40 / €40)

See more at Tailfin

Stinner Tunnel Hardtail Select and Podium (Steel and Titanium)

Stinner Frameworks introduces two new models to its growing line of complete stock bicycles: the Tunnel Select and Podium. Fabricated from start to finish in Santa Barbara, CA, Stinner Stock offers affordable bikes with the same attention to detail and craftsmanship as its custom offerings. The Tunnel has been a mainstay in Stinner’s line for years, a playful hardtail sitting firmly in the middle of the road from a geometry standpoint.

  • Tunnel Select: $1495 Frameset / $4495 Complete
  • Tunnel Podium Frameset: $2695
  • Tunnel Podium SRAM GX AXS T-Type: $6095
  • Tunnel Podium SRAM X0 AXS T-Type: $7795

See more at Stinner Frameworks.

Salsa’s All-New Spearfish

Salsa took its XC all-day pedal bike and updated its geometry, slackening the head angle 1.5º, increasing reach numbers by 30 mm per size, and upping the travel 20 mm, which makes it a 100-120 mm rear and 100-130 mm travel fork. The last Spearfish update was in 2019, so these new tweaks and paint colors are a welcomed change to this timeless platform.

Specs:

  • Frame Price: $3499
  • Price: $3999-10999
  • As shown: $6499
  • 29″ wheels
  • Carbon frame, Deluxe – 250 grams lighter than standard layup
  • 100-120mm frame travel, 100-130mm fork
  • 66.3° head angle, 77.3° seat angle
  • 5 sizes

Check out more at Salsa.

DT Swiss 350 Limited DEG Hubs

The DT Swiss 350 has been big on value but complicated with its ratchet ring in the past. Today, the brand announced that the 350 Classic hub now comes in DEG form, which allows the drive-side hub bearing to be removed with the ratchet ring in place. An added bonus is the 5º engagement from the 72t ratchet DEG, too. They’ve also upped the bearing size.

Specs:

  • 12/148 mm, 12/157 mm BO+
  • RATCHET DEG 72T
  • Center Lock / IS (6-bolt)
  • Aluminum body
  • 28 or 32h
  • Shimano MICRO SPLINE, SRAM XD or Shimano HG drivers

See more at DT Swiss

RockShox New Deluxe Shock

Deluxe offers the complete package: an inline shock with all the tuning options needed for precise ride performance, lightweight, and bottom-out control for aggressive riding. With an independent Low-Speed Compression adjustment, riders can optimize Deluxe Ultimate’s performance for their riding style.

  • NEW Lighter compression tunes let you dial in the perfect balance between efficiency and descending capability for your bike
  • Ultimate model features independent Low Speed Compression and Low Speed Rebound adjustments and easy access lever to go from Open to Firm/Lock
  • NEW Electric Red Signature colorway
  • NEW bottom-out system prioritizes a more open compression and air spring feel enhancing control and eliminating unwanted noise
  • Maximize testing and tuning efforts with consistent “feel” between Deluxe Ultimate, Deluxe Select+ and Deluxe Select at the same tune
  • DebonAir+ Linear XL air can offers all the tuning potential and range in one compact unit

NEW DELUXE ULTIMATE

  • DAMPER: RCT
  • AIR SPRING: DebonAir+ Linear XL
  • WEIGHT: 313g*
  • MSRP: $ 399, € 435**, £ 390**

NEW DELUXE SELECT+

  • DAMPER: RL, RT
  • AIR SPRING: DebonAir+ Linear XL
  • WEIGHT: 313g*
  • MSRP: Not available Aftermarket

NEW DELUXE SELECT

  • DAMPER: R
  • AIR SPRING: DebonAir+ Linear XL
  • WEIGHT: 317g*
  • MSRP: Not available Aftermarket

Charger Race Day 2 Flight Attendant Upgrade Kits

The new Charger Race Day 2 Flight Attendant Upgrade Kit puts ultimate control at your fingertips by upgrading your SID or SID SL to an electronic damper featuring an automatic three-position Compression adjustment—Open, Pedal, and Lock. With Flight Attendant’s latest feature, this kit can transform any hardtail into a Flight Attendant bike, offering the personalization and efficiency that adapts seamlessly to every ride, from all-out XC sprints to endurance challenges.  

Specs:

  • Upgrades existing and current SID and SID SL forks 2021-2024 (C1-E1 Generations)
  • Fork-Only update enables the Flight Attendant system to seamlessly adapt
    to hardtail bikes
  • Charger Race Day 2 Flight Attendant electronic damper features an automatic three position Compression adjustment (Open/Pedal/Lock positions) with independent adjustable Rebound
  • Flight Attendant system requires
    a Flight Attendant fork and an AXS pedal sensor or power meter, with optional
    AXS components enhancing connectivity and precision
  • Includes Charger Race Day 2 Flight Attendant fork damper and Control
    Module for SID or SID SL, a SRAM Battery, and Battery Charger
  • MSRP: $ 599, € 649*, £ 579*, AU$ 999
    *Includes VAT

Time Xysto Pedals

Time Xysto is a robust full-bodied pedal system for DH, Enduro, and aggressive off-road riders. The asymmetrical design fits the natural shape of your sole, with the extra-large platform providing additional support and control. TIME’s proven ATAC technology provides easy entry, retention, and mud clearance.

Specs:

  • Extra-large 79x94mm platform provides additional support and control
  • Asymmetrical design fits the natural shape of your sole
  • Customizable grip pin placement
  • Adjustable release tension
  • ATAC design clears mud and debris every time you clip in
  • Easy engagement and performance in all conditions
  • Dark Grey alloy anodized platform
  • 57mm spindle length
  • 226g per pedal
  • 13/17° cleats included with pedals
  • Made in-house in Coimbra, Portugal

See more at Time.

 

Moots Limited Edition “California Dreaming” Gravel Bike

Moots, the uncompromising authority in titanium bicycle craftsmanship, proudly announces the release of the limited edition “California Dreamin'” Routt CRD gravel bike. A celebration of the West Coast, vibrant design, and Moots’ iconic quality, the California Deamin’ Routt CRD is a collaboration with Chris Johnston of OutdoorBros.

Renowned for fusing cycling performance with compelling lifestyle storytelling, Johnston brings California’s adventurous spirit vividly to life in this exclusive build designed to “Outlast Everything.” Limited to just 25 bicycles, the California Dreamin’ Routt CRD is handcrafted in Steamboat Springs, CO, and expertly blends Moots’ hallmark precision and craftsmanship with inspiration drawn directly from California’s diverse riding terrain.

Specs:

  • Moots Routt CRD titanium frame
  • SRAM Red XPLR drivetrain
  • ZIPP 303 XPLR SW wheels
  • Premium components from Chris King and WTB
  • MSRP: $15,899

Find out more at Moots

 

Granite Design Chaindock Dummy Hub

Meet the Granite ChainDock Dummy Hub — your bike’s best travel buddy! Say goodbye to worries about frame damage when your rear wheel is removed. ChainDock safeguards your rear triangle from compression during transport, even under the airline luggage.

With an adjustable length of 130 mm to 157 mm, it’s a perfect fit for nearly any hub size. The built-in docking wheel keeps your chain perfectly aligned and lets you spin the crank for quick, hassle-free maintenance.

Built tough with 6061 alloy and compatible with QR and 12mm through-axle setups, ChainDock makes traveling with your bike safer and maintenance easier than ever.

Specs:

  • Weight: 73g (12mm Thru Axle), 83g (including QR adaptor)
  • Axle Compatibility: QR and 12mm thru axle / 135mm – 157mm width
  • Color: Black
  • MSRP: $28.99

Find out more at Granite Design

Granite Design Suture Tire Plug Kit

The Suture Tire Plug kit is an essential tool features a precision CNC-machined alloy body that’s lightweight yet exceptionally strong, built to handle tire repairs with ease.

The built-in insertion fork, cleverly integrated into the tool housing end cap, allows for quick and hassle-free tire repairs. Equipped with 10 versatile plug strips—5 of 1.5mm and 5 of 3.5mm, it’s perfect for tackling punctures of different sizes. Additionally, it includes a dedicated slot on the tool housing for removing Presta valve cores, further enhancing its versatility for essential maintenance tasks.

Specs:

  • Weight: 24g
  • Colour: Black / Orange
  • Included: 5 tire plugs each of 1.5mm and 3.5mm
  • MSRP: $15.99

Find out more at Granite Design

Granite Design Suture Aero Tire Plug Kit

For a sleeker design, Granite made the Suture Aero.

It is your ultimate tool for seamless tire repairs and inflation. Combining the features of the original Suture with a built-in CO2 inflator, this versatile tool kit ensures quick puncture fixes and fast reinflation.

Specs:

  • Weight: 33g
  • Colour: Black / Orange
  • Included: 5 tire plugs each of 1.5mm and 3.5mm
  • MSRP: $26.99

Find out more at Granite Design

Odyssey Optis Tubeless Insert

OPTIS (Odyssey Pneumatic Tire Insert System) is a lightweight, highly tunable, high-efficiency, tubeless tire insert. Tire assemblies are one of the most important performance factors for any bike. They provide all the grip to the ground, they serve as a critical first element of the bikeʼs suspension and they provide essential support to the cornering forces that the bike encounters. Pressure choice is always a compromise to balance these requirements.

OPTIS separates the function of the bikeʼs grip from its suspension and stability by turning the tire into a two-chamber system. As a result, some important advantages are achieved.

Find out more at Odyssey

Fizik Unveils All-New Helmet Range

For decades, Fizik has set the benchmark in cycling performance with its industry-leading saddles and shoes. Now, the Italian brand takes its next natural step: introducing helmets. Designed for every rider and every discipline, the new range delivers cutting-edge performance across road, gravel, triathlon, and trail.

Available in four models, the Kudo and Kudo Aero are designed for road, gravel and XC while the Kassis is tailored for off-road trail riders and the Kunée is optimized for TT and Triathlon.

Kudo

Designed for road, gravel and XC riders, the highly ventilated and lightweight helmet is ideal for cyclists tackling long mountain climbs, gravel adventures, and everyday riding.

Specs:

  • Weight: from 270 g
  • Sizes: S (52-56cm), M (56-59cm), L (59-61cm)
  • Colors: White, Black, Bronze
  • Price £269.99 / $289.99 / €290,00

Kudo Aero

Engineered for speed, the aero design features strategically placed air inlets to balance ventilation with aerodynamic efficiency. The Kudo Aero is the perfect choice for riders seeking additional watt savings in road races and beyond.

Specs:

  • Weight: from 270 g
  • Sizes: S (52-56cm), M (56-59cm), L (59-61cm)
  • Colors: White, Black, Silver
  • Price £269.99 / $289.99 / €290,00

Kunée

Developed through extensive wind tunnel and CFD testing, its teardrop profile, smooth shell, and strategically corrugated side panels minimize drag while optimizing airflow. A honeycomb-grid ventilation system above the visor ensures cooling without compromising aerodynamics, while additional vents and lightweight padding enhance airflow and thermoregulation.

Specs:

  • Magnetically-attached ventilated visor
  • Removable and washable inner padding
  • Mirrored & clear visors included
  • Helmet case included
  • Weight: from 350 g without visor
  • Sizes: S/M (54-58cm), M/L (58-61cm)
  • Colors: White
  • Price £359.99 / $379.99 / €380,00

Kassis

Combining exception ventilation with enhanced protection in the occipital and lateral areas, the lightweight yet durable construction provides extended coverage for demanding off-road conditions.

Specs:

  • Adjustable front peak
  • Weight: from 330 g
  • Sizes: S (52-56cm), M (56-59cm), L (59-61cm)
  • Colors: White, Dark Navy, Mud – Sand
  • Price £189.99 / $199.99 / €200,00

Find the whole range at Fizik
